body: I can't find the page where you answer the staff application questions. Can someone give me the link?
body_tagged: I can't find the page where you answer the staff application questions. Can someone give me the link?
title: I need a bit of help.

replies.body:
I believe you're looking for the Staff Applications page?
So you'll need this:
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3
and this:
http://avicus.net/forums/ef08bacb4

Also, it's located under the Administration tab.

Good luck!

replies.body:
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3
Make a new topic here, and write your application in the post.

reply_to.body: But where do I fill out the application? Those are just the pages explaining what I need to do. Sorry I'm confused
reply_to.body_tagged: But where do I fill out the application? Those are just the pages explaining what I need to do. Sorry I'm confused

replies.body:
You create a new discussion and from there, make your application.
No-one can see your app, nor can you see anyone else's. 
Only you and the staff can see your app.
replies.body_tagged:
You create a new discussion and from there, make your application.
No-one can see your app, nor can you see anyone else's. 
Only you and the staff can see your app.

reply_to.body: But where do I fill out the application? Those are just the pages explaining what I need to do. Sorry I'm confused

replies.body: So where are the questions I have to answer?
replies.body_tagged: So where are the questions I have to answer?

reply_to.body:
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3
Make a new topic here, and write your application in the post.
reply_to.body_tagged:
http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3
Make a new topic here, and write your application in the post.

replies.body:
Follow the criteria here:
http://avicus.net/forums/ef08bacb4

The format for your application is:

Age:
Skype: (not a requirement)
Timezone:

In 500 words or less, describe why you believe you should be a Moderator for the Avicus Network. You may include personal achievements, experience, qualities and any extra information that could benefit your application.

replies.body:
You can find TeamSpeak3 here.
It's free, you download it on the downloads page.
Enjoy!
